snippet: A FIFA appeals committee on Thursday upheld the decision, which bars Suárez from nine international matches and all soccer-related activity for four months, for biting another player.
abstract: FIFA appeals committee rejects motions filed by Luis Suarez and Uruguay’s soccer federation seeking to overturn or reduce his four-month suspension from soccer for biting another player during the World Cup.
lead_paragraph: A FIFA appeals committee on Thursday upheld the decision, which bars Suárez from nine international matches and all soccer-related activity for four months, for biting another player.

headline.main: FIFA Rejects Suárez’s Appeal of 4-Month Ban
headline.print_headline: FIFA Rejects Suárez’s Appeal of 4-Month Ban
